column1: Local Foods////Soups and salads are also available
column2: as well as Dr. Pepper in a bottle :) Overall a great date place for lunch/dinner
column4: or even for sitting outside on the shaded patio and reading a book while you sip on local draft rootbeer. Plenty of seating inside too. The restroom was also clean
column5: which is always a huge plus in my book.
